ValidationRule.description: Once the Purchase Date is set and the P.O.P. Attached? field is true, the Purchase Date cannot be changed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( RecordType.Name = 'Commercial Claim', RecordType.Name = 'Residential Claim' ), ISCHANGED(Purchase_Date__c), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Purchase_Date__c))), !ISBLANK( POPReceivedDate__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Purchase Date cannot be changed once set and the P.O.P. Attached? flag is true
